attributes.action: Suspend all congestion charging during adverse weather conditions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to ask for congestion charging to be suspended whenever there is adverse weather that significantly affects the public transport network. By imposing charging congestion at these times, key workers have no choice but to pay an unfair tax to get to work.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
